// import React from "react"; import { AiOutlineSend } from 'react-icons/ai'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { contactConfig } from "../content_option" export default function ContactUs() { const formRef = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_fmztxkc', 'template_4qkhicb', formRef.current, 'OdsapR4KpJKyC5q9T') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() }; return (

Contact Me

Get in touch

Email:{" "} {contactConfig.YOUR_EMAIL}

{contactConfig.hasOwnProperty("YOUR_FONE") ? (

Phone: {contactConfig.YOUR_FONE}

) : ( "" )}

{contactConfig.description}


 ); }
